page.title: 01High Kelling Woods & Heath
page.content: The area is flat with farmland, coniferous woods and heathland. The soil is poor and light but ideal for heather and Rhododendrons. Greshams School (public school founded in 1955 and recently turned co-educational) provides employment & shares its facilities with the local community. The major employment is at the two hospitals. Kelling Hospital (once a TB sanatorium) serves the local community and Pineheath Hospital cares for geriatrics. Home place is being converted to an old folks home. High Kelling has a high district church (previously a sanatorium chapel) but always parish status. It has recently developed in Holt, Kelling and Bodham parishes. It has an attractive community centre entirely built by amature labour, which serves it's largely retired residents well.
